auth.register_success: You had been registered, please check mail to confirm your account!
auth.confirm_register_success: You had been confirmed successfully, please login to enjoy!

user.password_requirements:
Password must be following:
  • At least eight characters
  • Include uppercase letters of European languages
  • Include lowercase letters of European languages
  • Include base 10 digits (0 through 9)
  • Include non-alphanumeric characters (special characters) (for example, !, $, #, %)
